about.title: About Me
about.description:
Full-Stack Developer | Expert in React, Node.js, Java and C#


I'm a full-stack developer passionate about transforming ideas into efficient and scalable digital solutions. With extensive experience in modern web technologies, I work in both frontend and backend, creating agile, secure, and intuitive applications. My software development expertise allows me to build robust systems, focusing on performance and the best user experience.


I constantly seek to improve my skills and explore new technologies to deliver solutions that truly make a difference. Shall we build something amazing together? ðŸš€

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with React and Node.js. Features include product management, shopping cart, and secure payment processing.

taskManager.title: Task Management App
taskManager.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates. Helps teams organize and track their projects efficiently.

weather.title: Weather Dashboard
weather.description: Real-time weather monitoring dashboard with detailed forecasts. Provides accurate weather data and beautiful visualizations.
